name: Phase 1
General Advisory: High risk individuals should work from home if possible and get priority consideration for workplace accommodations
Gatherings should be less than 10 people
Travelers: Travelers to MA urged to quarantine for 14 days (not required)
Lodging restricted to essential business only
Businesses: Limited personal services (hair salons/barber shops, pet grooming, car washes)
Retail (remote fulfillment and curbside pickup only)
Healthcare: Provide high priority preventative and pediatric care and treatment for high risk individuals (May 18)
Additional healthcare providers can do the same (May 15)
